sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SRV_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SRV_MST C ON ( A.SRV_ID = C.SRV_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A02' AND C.SRV_TP = B.CODE )
$WHERE_OPTION$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARM_INFO A WHERE SRV_SEQ = #SRV_SEQ#

SELECT A.SRV_SEQ, A.SRV_ID, C.SRV_NM, C.SRV_DESC, C.SRV_TP, A.SRV_DETAIL, A.SRV_CALL, A.SRV_DUR, A.PRE_DUR, A.AFT_DUR, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS SRV_TP_NM FROM SRV_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SRV_MST C ON ( A.SRV_ID = C.SRV_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A02' AND C.SRV_TP = B.CODE )
$WHERE_OPTION$
ORDER BY A.SORTS LIMIT #START_NO#, #PAGE_CNT#

SELECT A.SRV_SEQ, A.SRV_ID, C.SRV_NM, C.SRV_DESC, C.SRV_TP, A.SRV_DETAIL, A.SRV_CALL, A.SRV_DUR, A.PRE_DUR, A.AFT_DUR, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS SRV_TP_NM FROM SRV_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SRV_MST C ON ( A.SRV_ID = C.SRV_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A02' AND C.SRV_TP = B.CODE )
$WHERE_OPTION$

sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO SRV_INFO(SRV_ID, SRV_DETAIL, SRV_CALL, SRV_DUR, PRE_DUR, AFT_DUR, SORTS, REG_DT ) VALUES (#SRV_ID#, #SRV_DETAIL#, #SRV_CALL#, #SRV_DUR#, #PRE_DUR#, #AFT_DUR#, #SORTS#, NOW() )
INSERT INTO PARM_INFO(SRV_SEQ, PARM_ID, PARM_VAL, REG_DT ) VALUES (#SRV_SEQ#, #PARM_ID#, #PARM_VAL#, NOW() )
UPDATE SRV_INFO SET SRV_ID=#SRV_ID#, SRV_DETAIL=#SRV_DETAIL#, SRV_CALL=#SRV_CALL#, SRV_DUR=#SRV_DUR#, PRE_DUR=#PRE_DUR#, AFT_DUR=#AFT_DUR#, SORTS=#SORTS#, MOD_DT=NOW() WHERE SRV_SEQ = #SRV_SEQ#
